title: Reinstalling
body: I had to reinstall the game on my Mac and it is taking a very long time to download. I know some of it is because of my school internet downloading at 750kbps, but it has been installing for about 7 hours now. It is currently stuck on 75%. Should I wait and just see what it does or what? I have stopped and re started the installation process three times and deleted everything of LOL off my computer hoping maybe that would help.

replies.body: Thank you both for your responses. I took what EDOG said and went to a relatives house and was able to patch in just fine.

Yeah, I'd try a quicker network, or at least one that has fewer people using it, as *Edog* mentioned. If you get stuck at this point in patching again (or anywhere after 33%) then it is caused by a *poor connection* to the patching servers. In this case, I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this caused any change.
Is you're school the only place that you can download it? Do you have a relative or something you can go to in order to get better internet?
